business_requirements: Users should be able to login, browse products, add to cart, and checkout
ai_generated_scenarios:
[POSITIVE] Successful User Login
Steps:
- Given the user is on the login page
- When they enter valid username "standard_user"
- And they enter valid password "secret_sauce"
- And they click the login button
- Then they should be redirected to the products page
- And they should see the products list

[POSITIVE] Add Product to Cart
Steps:
- Given the user is logged into the application
- When they click "Add to Cart" on any product
- Then the cart icon should show "1" item
- And the product should be added to the cart

[NEGATIVE] Login with Invalid Credentials
Steps:
- Given the user is on the login page
- When they enter invalid username "wrong_user"
- And they enter invalid password "wrong_pass"
- And they click the login button
- Then they should see an error message
- And they should remain on the login page

[NEGATIVE] Checkout with Empty Cart
Steps:
- Given the user is logged in
- When their shopping cart is empty
- And they try to proceed to checkout
- Then they should see a warning message
- And checkout should not be allowed

approved_scenarios.name: Successful User Login
steps: - Given the user is on the login page
- And they click the login button
- Then they should be redirected to the products page
- And they should see the products list

approved_scenarios.name: Add Product to Cart
steps: - Given the user is logged into the application
- When they click "Add to Cart" on any product
- Then the cart icon should show "1" item
- And the product should be added to the cart
